mapper.select:
select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount, tc.carvolume as carvolume, tc.visitorsum as visitorsum, tc.purchasesum as purchasesum, (select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount, (select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount, (select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount, (select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount, (select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount
from t_car tc

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount, tc.carvolume as carvolume, tc.visitorsum as visitorsum, tc.purchasesum as purchasesum, (select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount, (select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount, (select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount, (select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount, (select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount from t_car tc where to_days(tc.cardate) = to_days(now())

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount, tc.carvolume as carvolume, tc.visitorsum as visitorsum, tc.purchasesum as purchasesum, (select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount, (select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount, (select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount, (select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount, (select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount
from t_car tc where TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(tc.cardate) = 1

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount, tc.carvolume as carvolume, tc.visitorsum as visitorsum, tc.purchasesum as purchasesum, (select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount, (select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount, (select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount, (select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount, (select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount
from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)
select count(*) 数量,mentcarstatu 支付状态 from t_car group by mentcarstatu
select count(*) 数量,carck 车况 from t_car group by carck
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%Y') week from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%Y')
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%w') week from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%w')
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%m') week from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%m')
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%m') month from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%m')
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%Y') month from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%Y')
select count(carck) count,date_format(createdate,'%w') month from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%w')
select count(*) count,date_format(createdate,'%e') day from t_car group by date_format(createdate,'%e')

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount,(select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount,(select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount from t_car tc
select group_concat(tc.carvolume) as carvolume,tc.visitorsum as visitorsum,(select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount from t_car tc

select group_concat(tc.purchasesum) as purchasesum,(select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount,(select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount from t_car tc

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount,(select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount,(select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)

select group_concat(tc.carvolume) as carvolume,tc.visitorsum as visitorsum,(select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)

select group_concat(tc.purchasesum) as purchasesum,(select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount,(select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)

select group_concat(tc.sellcarcount) as sellcarcount,(select count(tc.carstatus) from t_car tc) as cangkucount,(select count(tc.visitcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.visitcarstatu = 1) as visitcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)

select group_concat(tc.carvolume) as carvolume,tc.visitorsum as visitorsum,(select count(tc.expocarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.expocarstatu = 1) as expocarcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)

select group_concat(tc.purchasesum) as purchasesum,(select count(tc.placecarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.placecarstatu = 1) as placecarcount,(select count(tc.mentcarstatu) from t_car tc where tc.mentcarstatu = 1) as mentcarcount from t_car tc where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < date(tc.cardate)
